title: NCIS: Los Angeles
overview: NCIS: Los Angeles is a drama about the high stakes world of undercover surveillance at the Office of Special Projects (OSP), a division of NCIS that is charged with apprehending dangerous and elusive criminals that pose a threat to the nation's security, specifically Naval and Marine assets and personnel.

episodes.title: Ascension
episodes.overview: While Sam and Deeks recover from traumatic torture that will have a lasting impact on their personal and professional relationships, lives are still in jeopardy as the NCIS: LA team searches for stolen nuclear weapons.

episodes.title: Impact
episodes.overview: In an effort to help Sam and Deeks return to work, Hetty calls upon Operational Psychologist Nate Getz to help them cope with their traumatic experience. Meanwhile, the rest of the NCIS: LA team investigates the murder of a former Navy Admiral and a controversial journalist aboard a private jet.

episodes.title: Omni
episodes.overview: The NCIS: LA team must find who compromised a classified vaccine project from a bio tech company. Meanwhile, Deeks struggles with his emotions upon returning to the field.

episodes.title: Reznikov, N.
episodes.overview: The NCIS: LA team finds themselves in danger while investigating a kidnapping case of a man claiming to be Callen’s father.

episodes.title: Unwritten Rule
episodes.overview: Analyst Nell Jones joins the NCIS: LA team in the field when a former Navy officer’s girlfriend is kidnapped in exchange for Navy intelligence. Meanwhile, Deeks unknowingly breaks one of Hetty’s rules.

episodes.title: Big Brother
episodes.overview: Callen goes undercover at a prestigious high school after a 15-year-old hacker compromises terrorist missions.

episodes.title: The Livelong Day
episodes.overview: The team must notify Homeland Security when a murder investigation exposes a larger threat to a Los Angeles-based train.

episodes.title: Fallout
episodes.overview: When an antiterrorism device is stolen, the team must quickly find the suspect and the device before an attack is made against Los Angeles. Meanwhile, Hetty realizes the case is bringing her back to someone from her past.

episodes.title: Recovery
episodes.overview: Kensi goes undercover as a nutritionist and Deeks poses as a new patient at a rehab center to investigate the death of a Navy officer.

episodes.title: The Frozen Lake
episodes.overview: Callen and Sam enlist the help of a Gurkha, an elite Nepali soldier specializing in knife fighting, to retrieve a missing thumb drive.  Meanwhile, Kensi and Deeks struggle to find a balance in their partnership.

episodes.title: Iron Curtain Rising
episodes.overview: When a former Romanian Communist leader and suspected war criminal is discovered to be living in Los Angeles under a false identity, the NCIS: LA team must locate him before he disappears again.

episodes.title: Merry Evasion
episodes.overview: A senator’s daughter is the victim of a home invasion. The team investigate to determine if it was a random crime or a targeted attack due to her father’s crackdown on international cyber warfare. Meanwhile, Kensi’s holiday spirit changes after she receives a surprise Christmas gift.

episodes.title: Allegiance
episodes.overview: While in Afghanistan, Kensi and Granger join the team on a joint case when a federal agent in Los Angeles tied to Hawala, an ancient system of money transfer, is murdered.

episodes.title: War Cries
episodes.overview: When two private military contractors are murdered, the teams’ investigation leads to a suspect who puts one of their own in serious danger. Meanwhile, Sam sets up Callen on a blind date.

episodes.title: Tuhon
episodes.overview: Sam and Callen head to Mexico to search for Tuhon, a retired assassin they encountered on their very first case together, now a suspect in the murder of a diplomat. Meanwhile, Nate and Deeks stay in Los Angeles to assist with the investigation

episodes.title: Fish Out of Water
episodes.overview: Following an explosion at a fish market, the NCIS: LA team partners with an undercover DEA agent to determine if the incident is an act of terrorism or a botched drug smuggling deal. Meanwhile, in Afghanistan, Granger and Kensi investigate a helicopter crash that could be tied to their ongoing search for the infamous white ghost.

episodes.title: Between the Lines
episodes.overview: When an undercover agent is identified and executed by a local gang, the NCIS: Los Angeles team must locate the mole before other agents’ lives are put in danger. Meanwhile, Granger begins to worry when Kensi disappears in Afghanistan.

episodes.title: Endgame
episodes.overview: Following Callen's public shooting of the Chameleon, all is not well with the NCIS: LA team, as Callen is placed on suspension and Hetty adjusts to retired life.

episodes.title: Recruit
episodes.overview: A drone strike on a bomb-making compound in Afghanistan reveals the body of a recently retired Marine, leaving the NCIS: LA team to investigate why the Marine returned to Afghanistan and whether or not he betrayed the country he fought for.

episodes.title: The Fifth Man
episodes.overview: The NCIS: LA team investigate a compromised intel operation after four people connected to the classified project are killed at a diner explosion. As Deeks and Kensi are on the trail of those involved, they learn that a wayward teenage girl might be related and Kensi can’t help but be empathetic to her situation.

episodes.title: Dead Body Politic
episodes.overview: The NCIS: LA team investigates the tragic death of a U.S. senatorial candidate’s staffer who is run over crossing the street. The high-profile case becomes a matter of national security as the agents must determine whether it is an isolated tragic incident or a politically connected plot that might put others in danger.

episodes.title: Out of the Past (1)
episodes.overview: When a CIA agent who worked with Sam Hanna over eight years ago seeks his help and is soon found dead of an apparent suicide, Hanna and Callen suspect foul play and a bigger conspiracy. Meanwhile, Deeks finds his inner “dog whisperer” with Kensi as the two go undercover and enter a dog show with a prized poodle.

episodes.title: Rude Awakenings (2)
episodes.overview: The NCIS: LA team continues their investigation behind the death of a CIA agent that leads to a dangerous ring of Russian super agents. In a race against time, Hanna risks having a secret exposed.

episodes.title: Skin Deep
episodes.overview: The NCIS: LA team heads to the beach to question the possible link between a surfer, an Internet video and a dead Naval tech scientist. Meanwhile, as Callen and Hanna investigate the victim’s intelligence connections, Deeks and Kensi go undercover to catch their suspects and some waves.

episodes.title: Collateral
episodes.overview: The NCIS: LA team questions the motive behind the murder of a retired CIA agent turned millionaire and in the process also questions what Hetty knows about the case.

episodes.title: The Gold Standard
episodes.overview: The NCIS: Los Angeles team investigates the strange and brazen heist executed by gunmen in costumes that could directly impact the U.S. economy. Meanwhile, as Deeks testifies on a case, Granger insists on partnering up with a very reluctant Kensi.

episodes.title: Free Ride
episodes.overview: Callen, Sam, Kensi and Deeks spend Christmas aboard an aircraft carrier investigating the death of a fellow NCIS special agent.  Meanwhile, Nell and Eric make the most of the holidays back at headquarters and Hetty takes a trip.

episodes.title: Drive
episodes.overview: A former defendant of Deeks is targeted for discovering information that could dismantle a lucrative car shipping operation with links to a global terrorist ring. Meanwhile, the NCIS: LA team tackles the large-scale stolen car operation from the inside when Kensi goes undercover in an auto body shop.

episodes.title: Paper Soldiers
episodes.overview: A distraught widow is suspicious of the circumstances surrounding her Marine husband’s last battle and Sam and Callen help to determine if there has been a cover-up. Meanwhile, Hetty summons Operational Psychologist Nate Getz to be her “pawn” and the rest of the NCIS: LA sense another evaluation on the horizon.

episodes.title: The Chosen One
episodes.overview: Callen goes undercover to infiltrate a network of Chechen terrorists who are recruiting foreign fighters to join their cause and planning their next attack in the U.S.

episodes.title: Kill House
episodes.overview: Callen, Sam, Kensi and Deeks go undercover as an elite tactical force in order to investigate an ambush tied to a cartel kingpin with terrorist connections.

episodes.title: History
episodes.overview: An NCIS: LA investigation leads the team to question a lone survivor of a former terrorist organization, while Kensi and Deeks follow the trail into the woods

episodes.title: Lohkay
episodes.overview: Callen is concerned that Sam might be too invested after he takes on a missing persons case for an Afghani elder who helped him years ago when he was wounded on a mission.

episodes.title: Wanted
episodes.overview: Sam fears for his family’s safety when his wife is called to resume a former CIA cover after a case suggests ties to the infamous Sidorov and his stolen nuke.

episodes.title: Red (1)
episodes.overview: Callen and Sam fly to Idaho and join forces with NCIS: Red, a mobile team of agents who live together and investigate crimes in various locations, when a murder weapon found there matches one used in a national security case in Los Angeles.

episodes.title: Red (2)
episodes.overview: While the LA team chases leads digitally and locally, the NCIS: Red team travels in their mobile trucks, nicknamed "Laverne and Shirley", in a race to track down a cunning terrorist before he disappears.

episodes.title: Purity
episodes.overview: When cyanide in a communal water jug lethally poisons a lieutenant and leaves a Navy pilot in serious condition, the NCIS: LA team investigates whether this is an isolated incident or an early test for large-scale water contamination.

episodes.title: Resurrection
episodes.overview: A body is stolen after a special task force successfully takes down an infamous cartel boss, leaving the NCIS: LA team to investigate the leak and track down the missing body.

episodes.title: Raven & the Swans
episodes.overview: Callen questions Hetty’s motivations when a bizarre case involving a mysterious woman is revealed to be an undercover agent from her past.

episodes.title: Parley
episodes.overview: Deeks goes undercover to obtain information about an infamous arms dealer looking to get back in the business, but the woman he befriends leads the operation in a dangerous directon. Meanwhile, Kensi confronts new emotions as she runs surveillance on Deeks and his female source.

episodes.title: Descent
episodes.overview: A nuclear explosion in the Pacific reignites the search for stolen nuclear weapons and prompts Hetty to shuffle the NCIS: LA partnerships, sending Callen and Kensi overseas and leaving Sam and Deeks teamed up state side.

episodes.title: Lange, H.
episodes.overview: The Special Projects team travels to Romania to search for Hetty, while delving into the history of the Comescu crime family, and their connection to Callen. Meanwhile, Eric and Nell discover that Lauren Hunter, the Office of Special Projects' Operations Manager, is a member of the Comescus.

episodes.title: Cyber Threat
episodes.overview: The NCIS team joins forces with the NSA to find the creator and controller of a software program linked to a cyber attack against the Department of Defense. Meanwhile, Callen continues searching for more information about his past.

episodes.title: Backstopped
episodes.overview: Special Agent Sam Hanna is sent undercover as a bomb specialist as the team races to locate stolen explosives somewhere in the city. Meanwhile, to much protest, Hunter changes the dynamics of the team and has Callen partnered with Kensi and Sam with Deeks.

episodes.title: Deadline
episodes.overview: The NCIS team delves into the underground world of the Libyan resistance movement following the murder of a news reporter, and Hetty reveals details about Callen’s past.

episodes.title: Sacrifice
episodes.overview: The LAPD calls upon the NCIS team when a raid links a Mexican drug cartel to a wanted terrorist. Meanwhile, Sam’s most prized possession is stolen.

episodes.title: Lone Wolf
episodes.overview: The NCIS team investigates the murder of a former Navy intelligence officer who had been living a double life and traveling overseas on false passports.

episodes.title: Honor
episodes.overview: The NCIS team must determine whether a dishonorably discharged Marine is the target of an international set-up or if he committed murder

episodes.title: Greed
episodes.overview: When a Navy ID is found on a dead body tied to a hazardous material smuggling case, NCIS is granted permission to investigate in Mexico and asked to help locate the missing materials.

episodes.title: Betrayal
episodes.overview: After Sam’s undercover mission in Sudan turns deadly, Callen and the NCIS team must track down their missing agent before it is too late.

episodes.title: The Debt
episodes.overview: A botched assignment forces Hetty to fire Deeks and send him back to the LAPD. Meanwhile, an awkward goodbye between Kensi and Deeks leaves her with unexpected emotions for her old partner

episodes.title: Higher Power
episodes.overview: The NCIS team must locate a classified device with the power to destroy Los Angeles that was stolen from a college research facility. Meanwhile, Sam tries to track down a highly sought-after Christmas present for his daughter, and Eric meets Nell’s parents.

episodes.title: The Watchers
episodes.overview: A new Assistant Director is assigned to oversee LA operations for NCIS, the team begins to wonder what his intentions really are.

episodes.title: Exit Strategy
episodes.overview: When a vehicle transporting Jada Khaled is ambushed, NCIS must track down the culprit to save her and their case. Meanwhile, Sam is forced to confront Jada for the first time since returning from Sudan.

episodes.title: Partners
episodes.overview: After a diplomatic service van transporting an unknown package from the State Department is hijacked, the NCIS team must determine who committed the crime and what has gone missing. Meanwhile, Callen and Sam celebrate five years as partners, but face one of their biggest challenges when they go undercover for a case.

episodes.title: Crimeleon
episodes.overview: With Assistant Director Granger critiquing every move, the NCIS team must track down a chameleon-like killer who has evaded law enforcement agents, including their very own Special Agent G. Callen, across several countries.

episodes.title: Blye, K. (1)
episodes.overview: The team searches for new evidence to prove Kensi Blye’s innocence after she is taken into custody as the lead suspect in a murder investigation involving her deceased father’s sniper unit.

episodes.title: Blye, K. (2)
episodes.overview: The NCIS: LA team continues to search for new evidence to prove Kensi Blye’s innocence after a private meeting involving her deceased father’s sniper unit turns deadly.

episodes.title: The Dragon and the Fairy
episodes.overview: The NCIS: LA team investigates a shooting outside the Vietnamese Consulate just prior to an international conference at the venue that the Secretary of the Navy is scheduled to attend.

episodes.title: Vengeance
episodes.overview: When the body of a Navy Intel Officer is found, evidence points to a team of Navy SEALs who are about to depart on a hostage rescue mission, leaving former Navy SEAL Sam Hanna to interrogate the group and possibly compromise the mission.

episodes.title: Patriot Acts
episodes.overview: When a former Marine is suspected of creating a chemical bomb, the NCIS: LA team joins the FBI’s domestic terrorist task force including Operational Psychologist Nate Getz.

episodes.title: Touch of Death (2)
episodes.overview: The joint NCIS: Los Angeles and Hawaii Five-0 task force travel from Hawaii to Los Angeles, when the lead suspect in the case moves to the mainland with a deadly virus in tow. Series crossover part 1 is Hawaii Five-0 (2010) S02E21.

episodes.title: Neighborhood Watch
episodes.overview: Kensi and Deeks are sent undercover as married couple Melissa and Justin when evidence points to a Russian sleeper cell in a suburban neighborhood.

episodes.title: Sans Voir (1)
episodes.overview: Callen and the NCIS: LA team confront their vengeful adversary, the Chameleon, when an undercover case ignites a deadly mind game orchestrated by the criminal mastermind.

episodes.title: Sans Voir (2)
episodes.overview: The L.A. team is drawn into a deadly mind game against a master criminal motivated by Revenge.

episodes.title: Human Traffic
episodes.overview: When one of their own disappears while undercover, the team must work alongside LAPD on a case involving human-trafficking, money laundering and drugs.

episodes.title: Black Widow
episodes.overview: After a mysterious hit squad takes out a Special Agent on assignment, the NCIS team jumps into action before the next target is set.

episodes.title: Borderline
episodes.overview: The NCIS team jumps into action when video surveillance footage shows an ambush on a humvee transporting Marines in the desert. Meanwhile, Nate returns from his mystery assignment.

episodes.title: Special Delivery
episodes.overview: The team investigates the murder of a Marine who had top-level security clearance, and the corpse is missing a hand.

episodes.title: Little Angels
episodes.overview: The team races against time to save a Naval Commander's daughter after seeing a video of her being buried alive.

episodes.title: Standoff
episodes.overview: Callen's ex-partner (Marisol Nichols) takes a Navy recruitment center hostage.

episodes.title: Anonymous
episodes.overview: After terrorists kill a state department employee and a plastic surgeon, the team searches for the only witness who can identify the killers' surgically altered faces.

episodes.title: Bounty
episodes.overview: Wanted terrorists and top secret information are all involved in NCIS's investigation into the kidnapping and murder of a retired army Sergeant.

episodes.title: Absolution (1)
episodes.overview: When a murdered antiques dealer's book of top-secret information goes missing, Hetty sends the NCIS team on a mission to find it.

episodes.title: Deliverance (2)
episodes.overview: Hetty and the NCIS team continue to search for an elusive book that has the attention of several foreign security agencies.

episodes.title: Disorder
episodes.overview: Kensi connects personally with a discharged Navy Intelligence officer suffering from post traumatic stress disorder who is the sole survivor of a deadly dispute being investigated by the NCIS team.

episodes.title: Overwatch
episodes.overview: The NCIS team uncovers an experimental Navy tracking system when a body containing a top-secret residue is stolen from an autopsy room. Meanwhile, Callen challenges Hetty on the rock wall.

episodes.title: Archangel
episodes.overview: The team looks for the person responsible when classified pentagon documents are uploaded to a blog site.

episodes.title: Lockup
episodes.overview: Sam goes undercover as a prisoner to track down a terrorist group responsible for several bombings around the world.

episodes.title: Tin Soldiers
episodes.overview: After Callen catches a man breaking into his house, a former KGB operative leads the NCIS team to a shipment of counterfeit computer chips entering the United States.

episodes.title: Empty Quiver
episodes.overview: Suspicious of an undercover venture involving a deal between corrupt cops and military personnel, Callen and Sam try to expose the illegal operation by posing as California highway patrol officers.

episodes.title: Personal
episodes.overview: Deeks' morning routine is disrupted when he is shot during a convenience store robbery, leaving the NCIS team to investigate whether he was the assailants' intended target.

episodes.title: Harm's Way
episodes.overview: Sam resumes a former alias and boards a one-way flight to Yemen in hopes of tracking down a terrorist group's leader and rescuing the hostage son of a Saudi Prince.

episodes.title: Enemy Within
episodes.overview: NCIS investigates whether the life of a Venezuelan politician is in danger after a Navy Intelligence Commander who is responsible for tracking his moves suddenly disappears.

episodes.title: The Job
episodes.overview: When an attempted robbery takes place at a secure facility on a Marine base, Kensi must determine what the thief intended to steal.

episodes.title: Rocket Man
episodes.overview: After a rocket engine expert is killed, NCIS tech operator Eric Beale goes undercover for the first time to ensure that the classified technology used to build satellites is safe.

episodes.title: Plan B
episodes.overview: Deeks resumes an old alias he is not fond of in order to protect his best friend and chief informant from a criminal group that wants him dead.

episodes.title: Imposters
episodes.overview: A Navy SEAL imposter's death gives the team a lead on a missing canister used to make deadly bombs.

episodes.title: Familia
episodes.overview: Hetty's sudden resignation prompts Callen and the NCIS team to investigate the reason why she would disappear in the hopes of tracking her down.

episodes.title: Identity
episodes.overview: Callen returns back to the NCIS Office of Special Projects to solve a kidnapping case.

episodes.title: The Only Easy Day
episodes.overview: A case involving the murder of a drug dealer turns personal for Special Agent Sam Hanna when he discovers his former Navy Seal comrades are involved.

episodes.title: Predator
episodes.overview: The team is assigned to track down a missing unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) after it is compromised during a training exercise killing a marine before it disappears.

episodes.title: Search and Destroy
episodes.overview: The NCIS team searches Los Angeles for the lead suspect of a murdered Iraqi businessman, a former Marine who had been hired by a private security firm to protect him.

episodes.title: Killshot
episodes.overview: When a United States citizen of North Korean descent is murdered, the secrets to classified software are thought to be lost until NCIS uncovers a suspect from Director Vance's past.

episodes.title: Keepin' It Real
episodes.overview: The NCIS team must find a motive when they discover the body of a marine who had been living a double life as a wealthy bachelor.

episodes.title: Pushback
episodes.overview: Following the murder of a Russian woman, the NCIS team uncovers evidence that answers who and why Callen was shot six months ago.

episodes.title: Ambush
episodes.overview: While Hetty is attending a Senate hearing in D.C., the investigation of a murdered Marine Lance Corporal leads the NCIS team to stolen anti-tank missiles and a dangerous militia group.

episodes.title: Random On Purpose
episodes.overview: Forensic scientist Abby Sciuto joins the Los Angeles NCIS team when a murder case resembles the pattern for a serial killer she has been tracking.

episodes.title: Brimstone
episodes.overview: As the courtyard is being transformed with holiday decorations, the NCIS team races to solve the murder of a Marine by an exploding cell phone and to find the remaining men of his former EOD (explosive ordnance disposal) unit before another deadly explosion kills someone else.

episodes.title: Breach
episodes.overview: The death of a Petty Officer leads the NCIS team to a teenager in Sam's life. Meanwhile, Hetty is concerned about the effect that the workload is having on the team.

episodes.title: Past Lives
episodes.overview: The murder of a recently released convict forces Callen to go undercover solo as an old alias, while Sam and the LA team track him from a distance.

episodes.title: Missing
episodes.overview: The team rushes to a crime scene after receiving an "agent needs assistance" page and learns that one of their own is in peril.

episodes.title: LD50
episodes.overview: A crime scene poses a national security risk when the LA team discovers the location was used to create a deadly toxin which is now missing.

episodes.title: The Bank Job
episodes.overview: While opening a safety deposit box at a local bank, NCIS Special Agent Kensi Blye is shot after three armed assailants enter and hold everyone in the building hostage.

episodes.title: Chinatown
episodes.overview: The death of a lieutenant commander appears to be suicide but the NCIS team uncovers evidence corresponding to murder. Also, Operational Psychologist Nate Getz joins Special Agent Kensi Blye in the field.

episodes.title: Full Throttle
episodes.overview: After a sailor is killed during an underground street race, the NCIS team determines that his car had been sabotaged and contained confidential Navy equipment. Meanwhile, Callen is forced to take traffic school.

episodes.title: Blood Brothers
episodes.overview: The investigation of a drive-by shooting has the NCIS team searching Los Angeles for the dead marine's younger brother who may be the next target and the one with the answers.

episodes.title: Hand-to-Hand
episodes.overview: When an undercover operation has the NCIS team investigating a MMA gym and its fighters, Sam Hanna is tasked with donning gloves and entering the cage for a one-on-one fight.

episodes.title: Fame
episodes.overview: NCIS investigates the murder of a Navy officer entangled in the world of Hollywood glitz and glamour as the team is joined at Hetty's request by LAPD liaison Marty Deeks.

episodes.title: Found
episodes.overview: The NCIS team races to save one of their own when they receive video evidence of Special Agent Dominic Vail being held hostage months after he was kidnapped.

episodes.title: Hunted
episodes.overview: The NCIS team is on the hunt for a terrorist who escaped Army custody during a secretive transfer in Los Angeles.

episodes.title: Burned
episodes.overview: After Callen's cover is blown and compromises the unit, the NCIS team races to find out who is behind the security breach.

episodes.title: Callen, G
episodes.overview: Callen races against a ruthless adversary to locate a woman who knows the whereabouts of a forgotten fortune earmarked to fund a new war in the Middle East - and also holds the tantalizing key to his unknown past.

episodes.title: Legends (1)
episodes.overview: The team heads to LA to work with the team there to investigate a murder, which soon turns into something bigger. Meanwhile, Tony begins snooping into Ziva's private life. (Originally aired as NCIS Season 6 Epiosode 22.)

episodes.title: Legends (2)
episodes.overview: In Los Angeles, Gibbs and McGee continue working with the NCIS division in order to track a terrorist cell. Agent Callen goes undercover, while a psychologist uncovers the truth about the relationship between Gibbs and Agent Macy. Meanwhile, Tony fears that Ziva may not be loyal to NCIS. (Originally aired as NCIS Season 6 Episode 23.)

episodes.title: Pa Make Loa (1)
episodes.overview: Hawaii Five-0 and the NCIS: Los Angeles task force team up in Hawaii when there’s a suspect on the loose who is threatening to release a deadly virus into the population.  Series crossover part 1 is Hawaii Five-0 S02E21 . Series crossover part 2 is NCIS: Los Angeles S03E21.
